data.name: 迷雾 The Mist
data.detailed_description:
Summary

"The Mist" is a text association deciphering game. The game has 8 chapters and more than 40 puzzles. According to the text reminder of each level and combining with the current scene, deciphering is carried out.
This game tells the story of my last year, but I won't tell you details, it was not easy.
Go ahead and experience it yourself.

How to Play

The game has 8 chapters: Outset, Frustration, Confusion, Go Astray, Failure, Pressure, Desperation, Hope.
Each chapter has 5-6 levels.
A sentence will appear at each level, and players will find the correct method to pass through association, reasoning, judgment, and attempt.

Tips

1. Remember to turn on the volume.
2. Make sure you have enough patience.
3. Be ready to challenge your intelligence.
